email_text:
Subject: Important Notice from the Department of Education - Loan Forgiveness Program

Dear Student Loan Borrower,

We are reaching out to inform you about an exciting opportunity for loan forgiveness through the Department of Education's new program. As a valued member of our education community, we want to help alleviate the burden of student loans and provide you with financial relief.

This program offers eligible borrowers the chance to have a portion or all of their student loans forgiven, based on specific criteria such as income level, occupation, and repayment history. By taking advantage of this opportunity, you can significantly reduce or even eliminate your student loan debt.

To apply for loan forgiveness, simply click on the link below and fill out the necessary information. Our team of dedicated professionals will review your application promptly and provide you with further instructions on the next steps.

[Phishing link]

Don't miss out on this chance to free yourself from the constraints of student loan debt. Act now and take control of your financial future with the Department of Education's loan forgiveness program.

Thank you for your attention, and we look forward to assisting you with this valuable opportunity.

Sincerely,

The Department of Education
